document.heading: Public Service Commission and People’s Counsel Terms of Service Harmonization Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-101, the “Public Service Commission and People’s Counsel Terms of Service Harmonization Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-346. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 7, 2014, and February 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 28, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-289 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-101 became effective on May 3, 2014.
